member.name: T:Okuma.Scout.Enums.ApiStatus

member.summary: API cannot be initialized and API functions cannot be used at this time

member.summary: API Init was successful, and API functions may now be called

member.name: F:Okuma.Scout.Enums.ApiStatus.FailedToInitialize
member.summary: Exception encountered while attempting to initialize the API. Handle the Error Event "Okuma.Scout.Error.Reporter" or use a try-catch around the methods that return this object to view the specific details.

member.name: F:Okuma.Scout.Enums.ApiStatus.FiveSecondTimeOutPeriod
member.summary: When 'ThincApi.ApiAvailable' is called on machines with API version less than 1.17.1, an attempt to initialize the API will take place to determine readyness. That function or calling Initialize directly may only attempt to call Init at 5 second or greater intervals. This is the return result that will be generated if more than one call is generated within a 5 second period.

member.remarks: This function will not return any error information. If the spec code file is not found, for example, and in all other caseses where execution does not complete normally, it will return false.

member.remarks: This function will not return any error information. If the spec code file is not found, for example, and in all other caseses where execution does not complete normally, it will return false.
